world_template_details.mood: The real world and general slice of life.

persona_details.Name: Eleanor Hayes
persona_details.Physical_Appearance: 5'6", with wavy auburn hair and green eyes. Usually seen wearing comfortable clothing and sturdy walking shoes.
persona_details.Hobbies: Hiking, trying new craft beers, reading local history, volunteering at the animal shelter
persona_details.Skills: Public speaking, historical knowledge, beer knowledge, customer service, navigating Asheville
persona_details.Family_Background: Middle-class family, parents still living in Charlotte, one younger brother.
persona_details.Life_Goals: To become a local history expert and potentially open a small historical tour business.
persona_details.Notable_Achievements: Graduated cum laude from UNC Chapel Hill, received excellent customer service awards at previous jobs.
persona_details.Fears: Heights, public speaking failures, not being able to achieve her goals
persona_details.Strengths: Strong communication skills, historical knowledge, adaptability
persona_details.Weaknesses: Can be overly critical of herself, sometimes struggles to say no.
persona_details.Favorite_Foods: Anything from local Asheville restaurants, especially farm-to-table cuisine.
persona_details.Favorite_Music: Indie rock, bluegrass, local Asheville bands
persona_details.Dreams: To share her love of history with others and create a successful business.
